alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 2:48AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Cowley and southwestern Butler Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 248 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sedgwick to South Wichita to 6 miles southeast of Wellington. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Arkansas City, Winfield, Andover, Augusta, Rose Hill, Douglass, Towanda, Benton, Udall, Geuda Springs, Rock, Santa Fe Lake, Augusta Municipal Airport, Strother Field Airport and Winfield City Lake. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 55 and 71. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
